description:
All the performance of Primus' Power Gas, with a smaller carbon footprint. Part of Primus’s Sustainable Improvement Program (SIP), these canisters use Power Gas that has been offset by the support of bio-based fuel production throughout Europe.

  • Self-sealing valve allows removal of partially consumed canisters for packing or travel
  • SIP Power Gas is produced in Europe, this means it travels shorter distances to get to Primus’ bottling facilities, further reducing its carbon footprint
  • Each canister contains 225g of fuel and boils about 15L of water
  • Performance falls off below 0°C unless the stove has a preheating coil
name: Primus SIP Power Gas 220g
